Dear colleague,
please keep following in mind when downloading this data:

  • This data is classified as CONFIDENTIAL: Highly sensitive SAP Information that is accessible to only a limited number of specific individuals who have a defined 'need to know'. For more information, please review SAP's Global Security Standard.

  • You should only keep personal data as long as it is necessary for the specified business purpose. For more information, please review SAP's Data Protection & Privacy Policy.

  • You must delete any information or documents older than three (3) years. For more information, please review SAP's Information Governance & Records Management Policy.
